content: this is snowflake no 1 **winter flower** snowflake no 2 **frosted lace** //www ravelry com/patterns/library/frosted-lace-snowflake snowflake no 3 **flower star** https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/flower-star-snowflake-2 finished diameter 9 5cm thread required 20 m this pattern is one of 4 from the **christmas snowflakes mobile 2019** create beautiful christmas wall hanging in cotton thread this pattern is included in a 6 -page pdf download that includes 2 pages of photos and a chart **materials ** yarn scheepjes sweet treat bonbon 25 g/140 m and drops glitter silver 700 meters 10g hook 1 75 mm or 2 mm depends from your gauge scissors tapestry needle to weave in ends this easy to make **textured snowflake** can be a great decoration for your christmas tree worked in 6 rounds from the center out note that you have to be familiar **with post stitches ** fptr fpdc bpsc bpdc and cluster stitches it is optional but most snowflakes need to be blocked and lightely stiffened
